reviews.review_msg: she shouldnt be a teacher . she cant write and honestly i dont know anyone who actually liked her
It was just embarrassing watching her fumble and stutter for 2 hours each lecture. No wonder on 7 of 80 kids would show up by the term's end LMAO

I really liked this course! Most issues came from the fact that there wasn't enough enrollment to have a TA so that meant lots of group projects. Sophie is very nice and knowledgeable but very serious, not necessarily one of those profs you joke around with.
